DMEM/F-12+Glutamax + 13 B-27 minus vitamin A + 13 N-2 + 100 nM LDN193189 + 10 μM SB431542","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ds1s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eldhm","text":"D2-3 - DMEM/F-12+Glutamax + 13 B-27 minus vitamin A + 13 N-2 + 100 nM LDN193189 + 10 μM SB431542+ 2 μM Purmorphamine + 1 μM SAG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"copgd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ephvh","text":"D4-7 - DMEM/F-12+Glutamax + 13 B-27 minus vitamin A + 13 N-2 + 100 nM LDN193189 + 10 μM SB431542","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1773v","text":"+ 2 μM Purmorphamine + 1 μM SAG + 3 μM CHIR99021","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"irkt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65s80","text":"D8-11 - DMEM/F-12+Glutamax + 13 B-27 minus vitamin A + 13 N-2 + 100 nM LDN193189 + 3 μM CHIR99021","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db7e9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d4jp","text":"D12-21 (Terminal Media) DMEM/F-12 + Glutamax + 13 B-27 minus vitamin A + 13 N-2 + 20 ng/mL BDNF + 20 ng/mL GDNF + 0.2 mM Ascorbic Acid + 10 μM DAPT + 0.1 μM dcAMP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95f4o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbuth","text":"D22-34 (Terminal Media ) DMEM/F-12+Glutamax + 13 B-27 minus vitamin A + 13 N-2 + 10 ng/mL BDNF + 10 ng/mL GDNF + 0.2 μM Ascorbic Acid + 10 μM DAPT + 0.1 mM dcAMP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3og78","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frk2o","text":"D35+ (Long-Term Media) DMEM/F-12+Glutamax + 13 B-27 minus vitamin A + 13 N-2 + 10 ng/mL BDNF + 10 ng/mL GDNF + 0.2 μM Ascorbic Acid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7opo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5jna9","text":"Passage 1X106 iPSC into Geltrex coated 10-cm dish with Accutase and rock inhibitor (refer to material section).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":12,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ap7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"peel","text":"For the passaging add   of Accutase for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ej4o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"AAC9F020383011ED9785C7885C93F12D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"ECDAC7A0383011ED9785C7885C93F12D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1o4dh","text":"Add    of StemFlex , gently mix and transfer to a 15 ml conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dpkhq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"F707E9B0383011ED9785C7885C93F12D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ahnr4","text":"Resuspend the cells in    of StemFlex with rock inhibitor and Count the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1sbpj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"5ACEF920383111ED9785C7885C93F12D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5euk","text":"Starting on day D0, Aspirate all the media, wash the plate with PBS, and add  D0-D1 media (refer to the materials). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tfbs","text":"D1 change half the media with D0-1 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"187uo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fh743","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa7m","text":"D2 change half the media with D2-3 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2q22e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2109","text":"D4 change half the media with D4-7 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"nim7","text":"D5 change half the media with D4-7 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a8bno","text":"D6 change half the media with D4-7 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7tmol","text":"D7 change half the media with D4-7 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b1h54","text":"D8 change all the media with D8-11 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5il0d","text":"D9 change half the media with D8-11 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1qig2","text":"D10 change half the media with D8-11 medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjjdc","text":"On D12 change to D12 terminal media for final differentiation, change half media every 48h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e9hoj","text":"On D35 change to long-term maintaining media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
